享.definition: to enjoy; to benefit; to have the use of

享受.definition: to enjoy; to live it up; pleasure; CL:種|种[zhong3]

享年.definition: to live to the (ripe) age of

享樂.definition: to enjoy life; pleasures of life

享清福.definition: to live in ease and comfort

享用.definition: to enjoy (i.e. have the use or benefit of)

享福.definition: to live comfortably; happy and prosperous life
